game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the thief's den
game.description: The thief, a cunning rogue named Arin, has stolen the Golden Acorn pendant from the village elder. Track down Arin and retrieve the stolen item.

tasks.description: Speak to the village gossip, Elara, to gather information about Arin's possible locations.
Use your stealth skills to sneak into Arin's hideout and retrieve the Golden Acorn Pendant.
